A kitchen is a room or part of a room used for cooking and food preparation in a dwelling or in a commercial establishment. A modern residential kitchen is typically equipped with a stove, a sink with hot and cold running water, a refrigerator, and it also has counters and kitchen cabinets arranged according to a modular design. Common activities in a kitchen include cooking, cleaning, food storage, and dining.
In this kitchen, you can cook food, prepare meals, clean dishes, and store food items.
